ti:edition.ti:label: Quod Deterius Potiori Insidiari Soleat
ti:edition.ti:description: Philo Judaeus. Cohn, Leonard, editor. Opera quae supersunt, Volume 1. Berlin: Reimer, 1896.

ti:translation.ti:label: On the Principle that the Worse is accustomed to be always plotting against the Better
ti:translation.ti:description: The works of Philo Judaeus, the contemporary of Josephus, volume 1. Yonge, C. D., translator. London: Henry G. Bohn, 1854.
